topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54054615636872784de50100#post_54054615636872784de50100
The reason why linux doesn't have any viruses on the other hand is that the vast majority of white hat and black hat hackers use linux due to it being a non-visually based operating system(the reason why windows is so fucking slow now is that task manager is no longer the backbone of the operating system and everything is visually based thus drastically reducing performance).  So the second someone comes out with a virus for linux you're going to piss the utter fucking living hell out  of millions of programmers and imagine pissing off millions of programmers dog pilling on you to ruin your life.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
